upgrade_info~1. <color=#eb9e15>Silver stars</color> are used to unlock basic upgrade levels.
 
 2. <color=#eb9e15>Gold stars</color> are used to unlock advanced upgrade levels.
 
 3. Complete stages at <color=#eb9e15>Normal difficulty</color> to collect silver stars.
 
 4. Complete stages at <color=#eb9e15>Nightmare difficulty</color> to collect gold stars.
